data.fullContent: When the designers of the famous aeronautical plane company, Challen Aircraft, were asked to draw up plans for a new plane, they were thrilled. Everyone in their department was excited to see which one of them would win the design contest. After everyone finished drawing their plans, they submitted them to the design committee. The next day, the committee picked their favorite plan and awarded the young designer a cash prize. She was so excited that she had won the design contest that she ran out of the room and jumped around the building shouting and waving her winning plans in the air.

q1.translation: 当著名的航空飞机公司——Challen飞机公司的设计师们被要求设计一种新飞机时，他们兴奋极了。他们部门的每个人都很兴奋，想看看他们中谁能赢得设计比赛。每个人都画好方案后，把方案提交给了设计委员会。
q1.front: When the designers of the famous aeronautical plane company, Challen Aircraft, were asked to draw up plans for a new plane, they were thrilled. Everyone in their department was excited to see which one of them would win the design contest. After everyone finished drawing their plans, they submitted them to the design committee.
q1.content: When the designers of the famous aeronautical plane company, Challen Aircraft, were asked to draw up ____ for a ____ plane, they were thrilled. Everyone in their department was excited to ____ which one of them would ____ the design ____. After everyone finished drawing their plans, ____ submitted them to the design committee.

q2.translation: 当著名的航空飞机公司——Challen飞机公司的设计师们被要求设计一种新飞机时，他们兴奋极了。他们部门的每个人都很兴奋，想看看他们中谁能赢得设计比赛。每个人都画好方案后，把方案提交给了设计委员会。第二天，委员会选出了他们最喜欢的方案，并给这位年轻设计师颁发了现金奖。她赢得了设计比赛，非常兴奋，她跑出房间，在大楼里跳来跳去，喊着，在空中挥舞着她获胜的方案。
q2.front: When the designers of the famous aeronautical plane company, Challen Aircraft, were asked to draw up plans for a new plane, they were thrilled. Everyone in their department was excited to see which one of them would win the design contest. After everyone finished drawing their plans, they submitted them to the design committee.
q2.middle: The next day, the committee picked their favorite plan and awarded the young designer a cash prize.
q2.ending: She was so excited that she had won the design contest that she ran out of the room and jumped around the building shouting and waving her winning plans in the air.

options.sentence: Their designs were to be put to the test the following week in a competition at MIT's Industrial Design School.
The next day, the committee picked their favorite plan and awarded the young designer a cash prize.
The other designer decided they needed to choose between the two designs they had proposed.
The design specialist thought the design they had chosen was the fastest, but they weren't sure.

options.sentence: The submitted designs focused more on the appearance and less on the function of the plane.
Challen Aircraft asked outside consultants for plans for a new plane.
The designers drew up their own plans and submitted them to the design committee, who selected a winner to receive a cash price.
The designers set up the competition to encourage people to be creative.
